price: Àwọn tí A fún ní ìmọ̀ mọ̀ pé, èyí tí wọ́n sọ̀kalẹ̀ fún ọ láti ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa rẹ, òhun ni òdodo, àti pé ó ń ṣe ìtọ́sọ́nà sí ọ̀nà Alágbára, Ẹlẹ́yìn.
arabic: وَيَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيَهۡدِيٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayarā alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma alladhī unzila ilayka min rabbika huwa al-ḥaqa wayahdī ilā ṣirāṭi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
